title: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
overview: Molly Mahoney is the awkward and insecure manager of Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporiumâ€”the strangest, most fantastic and most wonderful toy store in the world. After Mr. Magorium bequeaths the store to her, a dark and ominous change begins to take over the once-remarkable Emporium.
